ItemDescriptor.Name: Accurate
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Add one Blue per rank, Remove 1 rank per rank of Inaccurate. Look at the total ranks of both before removing.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Airborne
ItemDescriptor.Description:
No immediate effect.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Amorphous
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Before activating a Move with this trait instead select a target and use the last move they used. Reduce the PP of the Move with this Proprerty as normal.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Atrophy
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage lowers by 1 for each wound the user has.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Badly Poisoned
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Allows a Move to increase Poison to Poison 2. You must still activate the Poison Property for it to increase.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Bloody
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage for Moves With this property is equal to the number of wounds it currently has.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Critical
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Properties on Moves that have this property cost one less advantage to activate.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Crosshair
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Move check does not include black dice from armor or battlefield effects.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Dancing
ItemDescriptor.Description:
No immediate effect.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Delayed
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Moves with this Trait are rolled as normal including soak but no other effects including Type weakness or resistance, but the damage is not applied until rounds have passed equal to the ranks in Delayed. If the original target is no longer on the battlefield you may select a new target. A new check is not made and the new target’s soak is not applied but all other effects are.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Expertise
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage for Moves with this Property is equal to twice the number of ranks in the Moves Skill.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Heal
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Removes wounds from the target instead of adding them. Is not subject to armor or soak.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Homing
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Is not affected by Sky, Underground, or Underwater conditions

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Inaccurate
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Add one Black per rank, Remove 1 rank per rank of Accurate. Look at the total ranks of both before removing.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Innocuous
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Moves with this Property gain Locked Out until the end of the round when the user suffers wounds.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Kick Off
ItemDescriptor.Description:
A Move with this property gains the Locked Out Property at the end of the first action of the user after having rolled Initiative.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Lock In
ItemDescriptor.Description:
If the user has the Locked condition this has no effect. Otherwise suffer the Locked condition with ranks equal to the ranks of Lock In.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Locked Out
ItemDescriptor.Description:
A Move with this property cannot be used.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Loyal
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage is Pokes Loyalty multiplied by three

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Merciful
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Damage cannot exceed wound or strain threshold

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Morpheus
ItemDescriptor.Description:
A Move with this trait is Locked out unless the target is asleep.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Opener
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage lowers by 1 for each wound the target has.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Overwhelm
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage is equal to targets wound threshold

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Prepare
ItemDescriptor.Description:
If you have the Prepared condition this has no effect. Otherwise do not make a Move check this turn, User gains Locked 1 and Prepared conditions, do not lower PP count.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Projectile
ItemDescriptor.Description:
No immediate effect.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Random
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Instead of making a Move check use another Move instead based on this Move's description. If you would recieve STAB on this Move you gain it on the new Move even if it is of a different Type.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Recoil
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User takes wounds equal to the number of wounds taken by the target divided by the rank of this Property rounded up.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Reflective
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage for this Move is twice the last Special damage taken. This damage cannot have been taken prior to your last turn.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Replace
ItemDescriptor.Description:
After a Move with this Property is used, remove it from the users Move pool and add the last Move used by the Target.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Retribution
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage for this Move is 150% the last damage taken. This damage cannot have been taken prior to your last turn.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Rubber
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage for this Move is twice the last Physical damage taken. This damage cannot have been taken prior to your last turn.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Sacrificial
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User suffers wounds equal to ranks in Sacrificial after move is used. If Sacrificial has no ranks, the user faints after the Move is used.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Sharp
ItemDescriptor.Description:
No immediate effect.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Sleepwalk
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Moves with this property can be used instead of making a check to wake up from the Sleep Status Effect.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Sore
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Sky Condition

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Submerge
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User gains Underwater Condition

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Superior
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Increase base damage by one and generates one advantage in addition to the roll.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Tiring
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User loses their action next turn.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Trailing
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Moves with this Property can only target Pokes that have taken an action this round.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Underground
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains Recessed Condition

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Unsafe
ItemDescriptor.Description:
If you fail the Move check you take wounds equal to half the Moves base damage.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Vocal
ItemDescriptor.Description:
No immediate effect.

Cost: [0]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Adaptation
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Moves with this Property changes Typing of either the Poke or the Move. After activating, follow the Moves rule text in order to apply the effect.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Armored
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Increase your armor rating by one.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Dot
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains DOT condition with ranks equal to the rank of this Property.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Drain
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Reduce your current wounds by half the amount of wounds caused.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Echopraxia
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Worried 2 Condition user gains the Threatening Condition

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Fortunate
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains Lucky Condition

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Give
ItemDescriptor.Description:
You give your held item to your opponent if at the end of your turn they have two held items they drop the one you gave them.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Hold
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains Held Condition

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Hot
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains HOT Condition.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Insulate
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Insulated Condition

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Knock Down
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target becomes Prone

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Linked
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Each activation deals an amount of damage to the target equal to the base damage plus uncancelled success minus soak. If this number is not at least 1 increase the base damage of the Move by 1 until the end of this turn and the target takes 1 wound.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Mirrored
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Worried 1 Condition user gains the Threatening Condition

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Ominous
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains Unlucky Condition

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Quickness
ItemDescriptor.Description:
After a Move with this Property is used Set the user to the top or the Initiative order.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Rolling
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Doubles base damage for every rank of Momentum user has. Add an additional rank of Momentum to the user after the Move completes.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Pierce
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Ignore one soak for each rank or Pierce when calculating damage.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Pointless
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Reduces the PP of the last Move used by the target by the ranks of Pointless.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Rage
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Raging Condition.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Scatter
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Drop poke dollars on the Battlefield equal to 100 times the number of uncancelled successes plus advantages rolled.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Shrink
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Shrunken condition and their Armor increases by one.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Spin
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User gains an additional rank of Momentum.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Squish
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage is doubled if the target has the Shrunken condition.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Stockpile
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains 1 rank of the Stocked Up Condition. If they already have the Stocked Up condition increase its Rank by 1.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Strike Back
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Double this Move’s base damage if the target has dealt damage to the user this round.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Taunt
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User gains the Black Spot Condition. Enemies within Medium range gain the Taunted Condition.

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Vanish
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Incorporeal Condition

Cost: [1]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Aggravate
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gain the Aggravated Condition

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Blinding
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gain the Blind Condition

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Breach
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Move ignores Soak

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Break
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Removes Physical Resistance condition

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Chomp
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Eat the target's Berry if it has one.

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Cleanse
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Removes all conditions from the target

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Cut Off
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the unwary Condition with ranks equal to this Move's base damage.

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Disarm
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target drops their held item

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Discourage
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Special Defense attribute lowered by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Dull
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Physical Attack attribute lowered by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Electrify
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User Gains Electrified Condition

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Encore
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target suffers Locked condition equal to ranks in Encore

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Encourage
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Special Defense attribute increased by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Erode
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Physical Defense attribute lowered by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Exploit
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Base damage is doubled if the target is suffering from a non-volatile Status effect.

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Fortify
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Physical Defense attribute increased by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Grounding
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Grounded Condition

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Haste
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Speed attribute increased by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Hazard
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Applies Battlefield Effect from Move text

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Hide
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains Hidden Condition

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Hone
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Physical Attack attribute Increased by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Patient
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Double base damage of this Move if the target has already taken their turn this round.

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Poison
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Apply Poison Status Effect to target

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Predictable
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Predicted condition.

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Pull
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Move target one range band closer

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Push
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Move target one range band away

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Reach
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Hits sky targets and deals doubles damage

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Retreat
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User switches out as an incidental

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Reveal
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Removes Hidden from target

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Run
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Leave the current battle without making an escape check. (If used in a trainer battle effect is as if you had lost but you are not unconscious)

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Scare
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Force target to swap out on its turn

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Shatter
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Removes Special Resistance condition

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Slow
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Speed attribute lowered by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Steal
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Take the target's held item. If at the end of your turn you are holding two or more held items you drop all held items.

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Marine
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Hits Underwater targets and deals doubles damage

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Subterranean
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Hits Recessed targets and deals doubles damage

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Trap
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Trapped Condition

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Wane
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Special Attack attribute lowered by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Wax
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Special Attack attribute increased by one

Cost: [2]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Bully
ItemDescriptor.Description:
If targets current wounds are equal to or greater than half their wound threshold double the base damage of this Move.

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Burn
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Inflict the Burn Status Effect

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Confuse
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Inflict the Confusion Status Effect

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Differential
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Set users wounds to their current wounds plus target’s wounds divided by two.

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Imitate
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User gains all temporary Attribute changes that the target has.

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Equalize
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Set targets current wounds to equal users current wounds. If this would cause the target to exceed its wound threshold, set it at its wound threshold instead.

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Flinch
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains Flinching Condition

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Follow Up
ItemDescriptor.Description:
If the target has already taken damage this round, double the base damage of this move.

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Freeze
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Inflict the Frozen Status Effect

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Help
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target’s next Move base damage is 150% its normal value rounded down.

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Incurable
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gain Incurable condition

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Infatuate
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Inflict the Infatuated Status Effect

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Paralyze
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Inflict the Paralyze Status Effect

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Physical Resistance
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Physical Resistance Condition

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Reset
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Remove all temporary Attribute changes.

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Scope
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Gives all users Moves Accurate 1 if it already has Accurate increase the rank by 1.

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Sleep
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Inflict the Sleep Status Effect

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Special Resistance
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Physical Resistance Condition

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Torment
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Tormented condition

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Transfer
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Give a non-volatile Status Effect affecting the user to the target. It is then removed from the user.

Cost: [3]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Blast
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Deal base damage - 2 or apply another activated property to everyone within engaged range with the target.

Cost: [4]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Blockade
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Blockaded condition

Cost: [4]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Doom
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Applies Doomed condition to target with ranks equal to ranks of Doom Property.

Cost: [4]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Exchange
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User selects one of their abilities and one of the targets abilities. Each loses that ability and gains the others until the end of battle.

Cost: [4]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Impair
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Randomly select one of the target’s Abilities. That ability does not function until the end of battle.

Cost: [4]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Override
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Do not take Type weakness or resistance into consideration for damage.

Cost: [4]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Paired
ItemDescriptor.Description:
User gains Loved Pair Condition, Target gains Cursed Pair Condition.

Cost: [4]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Shield
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Target gains the Shielded Condition. After the Move check any move with Shield Property increases its rank by 1 then adds ranks of the Inaccurate Property equal to twice its Shield ranks. Moves can only gain 10 ranks of Inaccurate in this way.

Cost: [4]

ItemDescriptor.Name: Surround
ItemDescriptor.Description:
Deal base damage - 2 to everyone in short range of target.

Cost: [4]
